memberdef.name: closest_point_ISO

detaileddescription.para: Compute the point at minimum distance from a point [x,y] and the line segment

parameterdescription.para: signed distance if projection is orthogonal to segment

simplesect.para: 1 = point is projected orthogonal 0 = more than one projection (first returned) -1 = minimum point is not othogonal projection to curve
